name: Card O''Clock
description:
Hello everyone! 

Welcome in my LD#50 (🎂) entry : Card O''Clock. 

In this simple (yet complex) game, your goal is to delay the Timer as much as possible. If (When, actually) it reaches 0, it's Game Over. 

Features
  • Delay the inevitable in this card game where the Time is the main ressource.
  • Deck building mechanics.
  • Tutorial to help you understand the core mechanics.
  • Create powerful combos that can even make a Malus card useful!
  • A lot of different strategies.
Controls
  • You only need a mouse.
Team
  • I worked alone (well, with my cat). Everything you hear, see or play in the game have been made in 72h.
  • I streamed all the dev, you can find the replay on my twitch channel -and see the cat mentioned above!- ( https://www.twitch.tv/bastienre4 )

Thank you and I can't wait to hear what you think of the game :smile:.
